subject: Vam pro 2 pac
description_text:
Interested in the vam pro 2pac for my throttle/brake Simsonn Pro pedals.  But the picture for the vam pro 2pac shows a bracket for one throttle/brake and one for the clutch.  I do not want the clutch bracket, I need a bracket for the throttle and one for the brake.  Is this possible, how do I order this combination?  Also can you confirm I need the plus x control box, not the plus x ultra control box.
Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi steve k,     You can add a note to your order requesting the throttle and brake mounts. Additionally, you will need the PlusX controller and a 24V power supply.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053467962
